name: Skyiron
description:
Play a bird trying to free it's island from a hostile force.

You must fly through the drones to destroy them and destroy the crystals that are inside the floating house. 

Keyboard Controls

  • WASD or Arrow keys for Tilt + Roll
  • E/D for Yaw
  • Space to flap (Speed up when going slow)
  • Z or Tab to break
  • X or Shift to tuck (Dive faster / roll faster)
  • V to change cameras

Controller:

  • Left Joystick for Roll + Tilt
  • LB / RB for Yaw
  • A to flap (Speed up when going slow)
  • X to break
  • B to tuck (Dive faster / roll faster)
